    • Method Detail

      • keepArtistInLibraryForSongOrNot

        public boolean keepArtistInLibraryForSongOrNot()
        Returns:
        user answer This prompts users if they think the artist is the right one for the song. This returns true if the answer from users is yes, otherwise returns false.

      • requestForAnotherInsertOfSongsWithName

        public java.lang.String requestForAnotherInsertOfSongsWithName()
        Returns:
        user answer(Y/N) This prompts users if they want to do another round of song importation. This returns the answer from users.

      • songNameRequest

        public java.lang.String songNameRequest()
        Returns:
        song name This prompts users for song name. This returns the song name given by users.

      • promptUserForYesOrNo

        public java.lang.String promptUserForYesOrNo()
        Returns:
        answer from users(Y/N) This prompts users for yes or no. This returns the answer from users.

      • promptUserForLikes

        public int promptUserForLikes(Song s,
                              java.util.Scanner input)
        Parameters:
        s - song
        input - scanner from keyboard
        Returns:
        likes of song This prompts users for the likes of a song. This returns the value for likes of a song given by users.

      • requestForMinimumLikes

        public int requestForMinimumLikes(java.util.Scanner input)
        Parameters:
        input - scanner from keyboard
        Returns:
        This prompts users for the minimum value of likes of a song. This returns the minimum value of likes of a song given by users.

      • requestForYear

        public int requestForYear(java.util.Scanner input)
        Parameters:
        input - scanner from keyboard
        Returns:
        value of a year This prompts users for the value of a year. This returns the value of a year given by users.
